title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.324 - Third-party payor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.324 - Third-party payor

State Regulations

An agency such as Blue Cross or the Medicare program
which contracts with hospitals and patients to pay for the care of covered
patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.324

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
